title: Happy Thanksgiving
author: VD
content_html: Today, we give thanks to God for that with which He has blessed us.  We thank Him for our families, for our fortunes, and for our freedoms.  And in doing so, we should remember that to those whom much is given, much is expected.
content_text: Today, we give thanks to God for that with which He has blessed us.  We thank Him for our families, for our fortunes, and for our freedoms.  And in doing so, we should remember that to those whom much is given, much is expected.
